com.pump.image.gif

Class MinimalGifEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.image.gif.GifEncoder
      • com.pump.image.gif.MinimalGifEncoder

  • public class MinimalGifEncoder
extends GifEncoder
    The minimal, bare-bones GIF encoder.

    I recommend not using this encoder except as a baseline to test against. This doesn't optimize anything: so files sizes will be unnecessarily large.

    • Method Detail

      • writeImage

        public void writeImage(java.io.OutputStream out,
                       java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                       int frameDurationInCentiseconds,
                       java.awt.image.IndexColorModel globalColorModel,
                       boolean writeLocalColorTable)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: GifEncoder
        This method is responsible writing image date to the output stream.

        (The header, logical screen descriptor, and global color table will already have been written by the time this is called.)

        Specified by:
        writeImage in class GifEncoder
        Parameters:
        out - the output stream to write the GifBlock's to.
        image - the image to write. This must be the full size of the GIF.
        frameDurationInCentiseconds - the duration (in centiseconds) of a frame.
        globalColorModel - the color model used for this GIF.
        writeLocalColorTable - if this is true then modelInUse should be written as the local color table for this image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the OutputStream gives us any trouble.

      • flush

        This does nothing for the SimpleGifEncoder
        Specified by:
        flush in class GifEncoder
